creator: BigFun Corporation Ltd
descriptionHtml:
People Vs People is a real-time puzzle fighting game with a new one-tap puzzle core. Play quick matches against other people!

Destroy the enemy base. Collect and upgrade new Booster Cards to dominate each stage.

Wait in the Globe Screen to be matched against players in the same World. Have fun!

Basic Gameplay:
- Tap the bottom row of blocks
- Match areas with Booster Cards of the same color to launch attacks, raise shields and heal up

Advanced Tips:
- Build larger areas before launching the attacks. Areas bigger than 5 blocks add Large Area Bonus
- Think ahead and see what blocks and Booster Cards are coming up next. Make Combos. Each Combo step adds +20% to Booster Card effect
- Level up your Booster Cards wisely. Know your Battle Deck
- Refine your strategy in each World and temporarily fold some of your Booster Cards. Folded Boosters Cards are not used in battle
- Win Super Star Battles to get 4x Stars

All Booster Cards and features are unlockable by playing the game.

Return to the game every 12 hours to collect all free gifts!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Super Star Battles now happen every 5 hours. Win or lose 5x Stars in 5 minutes of mayhem!
- Heroes of the Week chart. Who's got the most wins this week?
- All chests in Worlds 4, 5 and 6 now contain a lot more Booster Cards, so you can upgrade your deck faster
- Purchased chests contain 5x more Booster Cards compared to chests won in battles
- Graphics detail setting: Try the new Reduce Visual Effects option if your game slows down in battle

rated.label: Everyone
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Mild fantasy violence
Users interact, In-game purchases
Learn More

- Match areas with Booster Cards of the same element to launch attacks, raise shields and heal up

Advanced Tips:

- Think ahead and see what blocks and Booster Cards are coming up next. Make Combos. Each Combo step adds +20% to Booster Card effect
- Make Double and Triple attacks!
- Level up your Booster Cards wisely. Know your Battle Deck
- Refine your strategy in each World and temporarily fold some of your Booster Cards. Folded Boosters Cards are not used in battle
- Win Super Star Battles to get 5x Stars

All Booster Cards and features are unlockable by playing the game.

Return to the game every 12 hours to collect all free gifts!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- 3 new Booster Cards! Can you find them all?
- Element symbols are now shown in Booster Cards during battle
- Heroes of the Week Top 10 now receive Gems as a reward. Players of all levels compete for most wins!
- Ice Guy helps you to find some game features in a smoother onboarding
- Energy low warning sound
- Purchased chests now contain 7x more Booster Cards compared to chests won in battles

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- If both bases are destroyed the match is now ruled as a draw
- Bugfixes and visual improvements

title: People Vs People

creator: BigFun Corporation Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Latest update: Heroes of the Week, where players of all levels compete for most wins! 3 new Booster Cards!

People Vs People is a real-time puzzle fighting game with a new one-tap puzzle core. Play quick matches against other people!

Destroy the enemy base. Collect and upgrade new Booster Cards to dominate each stage.

Wait in the Globe Screen to be matched against players in the same World. Have fun!

Basic Gameplay:
- Tap the bottom row of blocks
- Pop areas of at least 2 matching blocks
- Match areas with Booster Cards of the same element to launch attacks, raise shields and heal up

Advanced Tips:
- Build larger areas before launching the attacks. Areas bigger than 5 blocks add Large Area Bonus
- Think ahead and see what blocks and Booster Cards are coming up next. Make Combos. Each Combo step adds +20% to Booster Card effect
- Make Double and Triple attacks!
- Upgrade your Booster Cards wisely. Know your Battle Deck
- Refine your strategy in each World and temporarily fold some of your Booster Cards. Folded Boosters Cards are not used in battle
- Win Super Star Battles to get 5x Stars

Players of all levels compete for most wins in Heroes of the Week! Top 10 receive Gems as a reward.

All Booster Cards and features are unlockable by playing the game. Purchased chests contain 8x more Booster Cards compared to chests won in battles.

Return to the game every 12 hours to collect all free gifts!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New Booster Pack gives +25% Stars from all wins and allows unlocking multiple chests simultaneously! A single Booster Pack lasts for 48 hours. Booster Pack is a limited-time offer available for purchase on selected days after reaching Lava Land (World 3)
- Bigger gem prizes for Top 10 in Heroes of the Week
- More Booster Cards in purchased chests
- Some visual glitches fixed

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Double Monday, win twice the coins from all battles every Monday!
- Extended 10-minute Super Star Battles in Worlds 4-6
- Minimum number of Booster Cards in battle is now increased in every World
- Combo multiplier is now shown next to the Golden Heart
- Booster Pack gives now +60% Stars from all wins, allows unlocking multiple chests simultaneously and is extended to last for 60 hours
- Coin pricing adjusted
- Bigger gem prizes for Top 10 in Heroes of the Week. Win up to 250 gems!
- Bugfixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New tutorial and improved onboarding
- In-game Reshuffle button: Use Gems to instantly reshuffle the board
- Battles shortened to 1 minute
- World 5 (Desert Oasis) and World 6 (Redrocks) now play faster
- Losing a battle in World 1 (Green Fields) doesn't reduce Stars
- Improved handling of profile photos
- Bugfixes and visual adjustments

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New Revisit World challenge available after reaching World 3 (Lava Land): Use Gems to revisit earlier Worlds and fight a series of battles against robot models of increasing difficulty. Complete each World to earn 1000, 2000, ..., 5000 Stars!
- Chat notifications cleared when viewing chat
- Bugfixes and visual adjustments

descriptionHtml:

Destroy the enemy base. Collect and upgrade new Booster Cards to dominate each stage.

Wait in the Globe Screen to be matched against players in the same World. Have fun!

Basic Gameplay:
- Tap the bottom row of blocks
- Pop areas of at least 2 similar blocks
- Match areas with Booster Cards of the same element to launch attacks, raise shields and heal up

Advanced Tips:
- Build larger areas before launching the attacks. Areas bigger than 5 blocks add Large Area Bonus
- Think ahead and see what blocks and Booster Cards are coming up next
- Make Combos. Each Combo step adds +20% to Booster Card effect

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Purchased chests now contain 9x more Booster Cards compared to chests won in battles
- Fixed visual glitch after purchasing Reshuffle while a Booster Card was activated
- Fixed double reshuffle if a normal reshuffle happens simultaneously with a purchased Reshuffle
